DOC.criteria: hemodialysis > 19 year age Pregnancy plan pregnancy Hypercalcemia ( > 10.2 mg/dl ) baseline Chronic GI disease Liver dysfunction Taking steroid Received investigational drug within 4 week Any allergy vitamin D3 Chronic vitamin D intake > 1,000 IU daily Dialysate concentration ( calcium 2.5mg/L ) remain constant Rx
